document.full_text: women's tennis badly needed an enthralling encounter to recapture the public's imagination but the fourth round slugfest between anastasia pavlyuchenkova and vera zvonareva on sunday did little to help the brand.
document.title: pavlyuchenkova grinds downs zvonareva
lines_and_colors: women's tennis badly needed an enthralling encounter to recapture the public's imagination but the fourth round slugfest between anastasia pavlyuchenkova and vera zvonareva on sunday did little to help the brand.
